00019 #ifndef _RESULT_HPP_cm130217_
00020 #define _RESULT_HPP_cm130217_
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <string>
00024 
00025 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00028 
00029 #include "db/base.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace processor {
00032 
00034   class result_base : private boost::noncopyable {
00035   public:
00036     typedef boost::posix_time::ptime ptime;
00037 
00038     typedef boost::shared_ptr<result_base> sptr;
00039     virtual ~result_base() {}
00040 
00041     virtual std::string name()   const { return name_; }      
00042     virtual ptime approx_ptime() const { return t_; }         
00043     virtual std::string format() const { return "TXT_0000"; } 
00044 
00045     virtual bool setup_database(db::base::sptr) const { return false; }    
00046     virtual bool save_to_database(db::base::sptr) const { return false; }  
00047 
00049     virtual std::string to_string() const {
00050       std::ostringstream oss;      
00051       dump_data(dump_header(oss));
00052       return oss.str();
00053     }
00054 
00056     void set_name(std::string name) { name_ = name; }
00057 
00059     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const { return os;  }
00061     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os)   const { return os; }
00062 
00063     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const result_base& r) {
00064       return os << r.to_string();
00065     }
00066   protected:
00067     result_base(std::string name,  ptime t)
00068       : name_(name)
00069       , t_(t) {}
00070 
00071   private:    
00072     std::string name_; 
00073     const ptime t_;    
00074   } ;
00075 
00076 } // namespace processor
00077 #endif // _RESULT_HPP_cm130217_
